alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 6:21AM EST until December 22 at 1:58AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 80,000.0 cfs, East River Road floods to a depth of 1 to 2 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Latest observation is unavailable. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
